members.name: msret_DailyRecurrence
members.description: Choice for daily recurrence - every weekday or every 'n' days

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

supportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'msret_DailyRecurrence_display' is added to the 'TaskSetup' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'msret_DailyRecurrence'
supportingAttribute.name: msret_DailyRecurrence_display

constantValues: Choice for daily recurrence - every weekday or every 'n' days

members.name: msret_EvaluateFrom
members.description: Date from which the task shall be evaluated using automatic or manual scheduling. It is calculated from Valid from date minus Task creation range on Plan.

constantValues: Date from which the task shall be evaluated using automatic or manual scheduling. It is calculated from Valid from date minus Task creation range on Plan.
